com.igormaznitsa.prol.libraries
Class PredicateTemplate

java.lang.Object
  com.igormaznitsa.prol.libraries.PredicateTemplate

public class PredicateTemplate
extends java.lang.Object

The class describes a template for a predicate argument. A term of a predicate will be checked with the template before execution.

Author:
Igor Maznitsa (igor.maznitsa@igormaznitsa.com)
See Also:
Predicate
